original_text: They saw the God of Israel there. Under his feet was something like a jewel called sapphire. It was as bright as a clear blue sky.
korean_text: 이스라엘의 하나님을 보니 그의 발 아래에는 청옥을 편 듯하고 하늘 같이 청명하더라

sentences.original_text: They saw the God of Israel there.
Under his feet was something like a jewel
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 발밑에는 보석과 같은 것이 있었습니다.

sentences.original_text: It was as bright as a clear blue sky.
